UtCloseMatcher
UtMatcher
UtCloseMatcher

Operates only on values (not on matchers). Treats missing values as normal JSL unless exactly equal. This behavior is to be consistent with UtEqualToMatcher.

Globals
Functions
ut close to
ut close to(
number value,
number delta 
)

Returns a success if the actual value is within the delta of the expected value.

Factory function for UtCloseMatcher.

Arguments
value
number

value to be close to

delta
number

how close is acceptable (+ or -)

Example
ut assert that( Expr( 5 + 5 ), ut close to( 10, 0.01 ) );
